name: Voyager Of The Universe
description:
A great scholar who has lost his memory due to torture in the cruel MarKo's dungeons wants to know who he really is...

Your Story - Your War

An Immersive Story - Breathtaking Adventure
The only weapon capable of killing cruel Marko is the wise commander looking for the Zülfikar sword
Find Zülfikarı, Kill Marko. Save the Peasants

FEATURES
- Includes many educational stories, stories and questions.
- It has a full 17 entertaining and teaching levels.
- It encourages reading.
- It is an educational game that you can play with your family.
- Prepared by educators.
- It has been pedagogically examined.
